HDR</li>\n</ul>\n</div>\n<p>The LIP6, Pierre et Marie Curie University and French National Center for Scientific Research (CNRS),  UMR 7606 UPMC - CNRS, is a computer science research laboratory dedicated to the modeling and the resolution of fundamental problems driven by applications, as well as to the implementation and the validation through academic and industrial partnerships.</p>\n<p> The main focuses are :</p>\n<ul>\n<li class=\"D0\">Safety, security and reliability  ;</li>\n<li class=\"D0\">Data science, intelligence and optimization  ;</li>\n<li class=\"D0\">Smart devices.</li>\n</ul>\n<p>LIP6 addresses these challenges at different thematic levels within its <a href=\"/recherche \">6&nbsp;departments</a>.</p><p></p>\n<a class=\"voir\" href=\"recherche\">More ...</a>\n<br>\n<br>\n<h1>ERC - European Research Council: Advanced Grants</h1>\n\t<p>ERC Advanced Grants allow exceptional established research leaders of any nationality and any age to pursue
